definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: It actually took all my luck to meet you for just a moment in my lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 在有生旳瞬間遇見你，竟花光全部運氣。

sentences.english: They will spend it all and much more before voters pronounce the verdict.
sentences.chinese: 在選民投票前，他們將會全部花光，或者再花更多。

sentences.english: They have to spend everything they earn every day.
sentences.chinese: 因此，每天孩子們只能花光當天所賺來的錢。

sentences.english: She soon made off with the fortune which she had gained when his father died.
sentences.chinese: 她很快就把她父親死時留給她的遺產花光了。

sentences.english: They still gonna leave after, no ways that they will always beside u.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些就是花光你的錢，你都象傻子一樣不知道。

sentences.english: Other, do not spend all ah.
sentences.chinese: 言下之意是，你們不要把錢花光呀。

sentences.english: A:My money is running out this month!
sentences.chinese: 我這個月的錢快花光了。

sentences.english: It actually took all the luck to meet you for just a moment in my life.
sentences.chinese: 在有生之年的瞬間遇見你，竟花光所有運氣。

sentences.english: It takes all my luck to meet you in my life.
sentences.chinese: 在有生的時間能遇到你，竟花光所有運氣。

sentences.english: He has spent all his earnings.
It essentibest friend took my luck to meet you for just a moment in my lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 在有生的剎時能遇到你，竟花光全部運氣。

sentences.english: She went through alb her salary in the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她週末把薪水全都花光了。

sentences.english: Cochrane emphasizes that savings are all spent.
sentences.chinese: 柯克蘭強調，目前存款已經全部花光。

sentences.english: I never expected to encounter you need to cost all my luck.
sentences.chinese: 有生的瞬間能遇到你，竟花光所有運氣。

sentences.english: He spent all his money, as well as wasting his time.
sentences.chinese: 他不僅華侈了時間，還花光了他所有的錢。

sentences.english: And their philosophy is " I know I how to earn money when I know how to spend money".
sentences.chinese: 他們的格言是“能花才更能賺”，花光用光自得其樂。
